name: Kelly McDonald
bio: Kelly McDonald is a seasoned executive and entrepreneur with over 20 years of experience in creating successful products and businesses. Her expertise in technical and analytics, strategic thinking, revenue operations and talent acquisition sets her apart in the industry. Kelly has a proven record of delivering cutting-edge solutions for 21st century marketers looking to connect with consumers through shared values and lifestyles. As Chief Product Officer at CIPIO.AI and CEO/Founder of KYNDOO, a data intelligence company revolutionizing influencer marketing, she has played a vital role in driving growth and innovation. She has also served as Senior Vice President, Revenue & People and Vice President, Sales & Operations at Realty Shares, an $870M real estate investment platform, where she led the development of the residential debt side of the business. Kelly is married and has two dogs.
